languages.text: {n}Кассия опускает руку, стараясь скрыть разочарование.{/n} "Конечно. Я более никогда не перекрашу ваши цвета против воли".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия опускает руку, стараясь скрыть разочарование.{/n} "Конечно. Я более никогда не перекрашу ваши цвета против воли".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia lowers her hand, trying to hide her disappointment.{/n} "Of course. I will never again change your colours against your will."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅放下了手，试图掩饰她的失望。{/n}“没问题，我不会再违背你的意愿，改变你的颜色。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia lowers her hand, trying to hide her disappointment.{/n} "Of course. I will never again change your colours against your will."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅放下了手，试图掩饰她的失望。{/n}“没问题，我不会再违背你的意愿，改变你的颜色。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Cassia lowers her hand, trying to hide her disappointment.{/n} "Of course. I will never again change your colours against your will."

languages.text: {n}Cassia agacha la cabeza, intentando ocultar su decepción.{/n} «Por supuesto. No volveré a cambiar sus colores en contra de su voluntad».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia lowers her hand, trying to hide her disappointment.{/n} "Of course. I will never again change your colours against your will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia agacha la cabeza, intentando ocultar su decepción.{/n} «Por supuesto. No volveré a cambiar sus colores en contra de su voluntad».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは手を下げる。失望を隠そうとしているかのようだった。{/n}「もちろんです。あなたの意に反して、色を変えようとは二度としません」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia lowers her hand, trying to hide her disappointment.{/n} "Of course. I will never again change your colours against your will."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは手を下げる。失望を隠そうとしているかのようだった。{/n}「もちろんです。あなたの意に反して、色を変えようとは二度としません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia senkt die Hand und versucht, ihre Enttäuschung zu verbergen.{/n} "Natürlich. Ich werde Eure Farben nie wieder gegen Euren Willen verändern."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia lowers her hand, trying to hide her disappointment.{/n} "Of course. I will never again change your colours against your will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia senkt die Hand und versucht, ihre Enttäuschung zu verbergen.{/n} "Natürlich. Ich werde Eure Farben nie wieder gegen Euren Willen verändern."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia abaisse sa main en tentant de cacher sa déception.{/n} « Bien sûr. Je n'essaierai plus jamais de changer vos couleurs sans votre consentement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia lowers her hand, trying to hide her disappointment.{/n} "Of course. I will never again change your colours against your will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia abaisse sa main en tentant de cacher sa déception.{/n} « Bien sûr. Je n'essaierai plus jamais de changer vos couleurs sans votre consentement. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, uğradığı hayal kırıklığını saklamaya çalışarak elini indiriyor.{/n} "Elbette. Bir daha asla renklerini değiştirmeye kalkmayacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia lowers her hand, trying to hide her disappointment.{/n} "Of course. I will never again change your colours against your will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, uğradığı hayal kırıklığını saklamaya çalışa çalışa elini indiriyor.{/n} "Elbette. Bir daha asla zorla renklerinizi değiştirmeyeceğim."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
